titleStmt.title: West Barbary, or, A short narrative of the revolutions of the kingdoms of Fez and Morocco with an account of the present customs, sacred, civil, and domestick / by Lancelot Addison ...
titleStmt.author: Addison, Lancelot, 1632-1703.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at the Theater in Oxford, and are to be sold by John Wilmot,

notesStmt.note: "An index of the Moorish words": p. [1]-[7] at end.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
